code: import React from"react";import View from"react-native-web/dist/exports/View";import FlatList from"react-native-web/dist/exports/FlatList";import{PRODUCTS}from"../data/Dummy-Data";import ProductsItem from"../components/ProductsComponent";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CategoriesScreen(_ref){var route=_ref.route,navigation=_ref.navigation;var category_id=route.params.category_id;var displayProductsPerCategory=PRODUCTS.filter(function(item){return item.categoryId==category_id;});var renderProductItem=function renderProductItem(_ref2){var item=_ref2.item;return _jsx(ProductsItem,{title:item.product_title,price:item.price,onSelectProduct:function onSelectProduct(){navigation.navigate("Product Description",{product_id:item.id,product_name:item.product_name});},image:item.productImage});};return _jsx(View,{children:_jsx(FlatList,{data:displayProductsPerCategory,keyExtractor:function keyExtractor(item){return item.id;},renderItem:renderProductItem,numColumns:2})});}
